Package org.thewhitemage13.repository

Interface SubscriptionRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Subscription,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subscription,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Subscription,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Subscription,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Subscription,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Subscription>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Subscription,Long>
@Repository public interface SubscriptionRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subscription,Long>
Repository interface for managing Subscription entities.

This interface extends JpaRepository to provide basic CRUD operations for Subscription entities. It also includes custom query methods for retrieving subscriptions based on follower and following IDs, verifying the existence of a subscription, and deleting subscriptions associated with a given user.

Key Operations:

  • Find all subscriptions by follower ID.
  • Find all subscriptions by following ID.
  • Check if a subscription exists between a given follower and following user.
  • Retrieve a subscription by follower ID and following ID.
  • Count subscriptions by follower or following ID.
  • Delete all subscriptions for a given follower or following user.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

    • findAllByFollowerId

      List<Subscription> findAllByFollowerId(Long followerId)
      Finds all subscriptions where the given followerId is the follower.
      Parameters:
      followerId - the ID of the follower
      Returns:
      a list of Subscription entities where the follower matches the provided followerId

    • findAllByFollowingId

      List<Subscription> findAllByFollowingId(Long followingId)
      Finds all subscriptions where the given followingId is the user being followed.
      Parameters:
      followingId - the ID of the user being followed
      Returns:
      a list of Subscription entities where the following matches the provided followingId

    • existsByFollowerIdAndFollowingId

      boolean existsByFollowerIdAndFollowingId(Long followerId, Long followingId)
      Checks if a subscription exists between the given follower and following.
      Parameters:
      followerId - the ID of the follower
      followingId - the ID of the user being followed
      Returns:
      true if a subscription exists; false otherwise

    • findByFollowerIdAndFollowingId

      Optional<Subscription> findByFollowerIdAndFollowingId(Long followerId, Long followingId)
      Finds a subscription based on the follower ID and following ID.
      Parameters:
      followerId - the ID of the follower
      followingId - the ID of the user being followed
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Subscription if found, or Optional.empty() if not found
